text:
Hello all,
This is Luc, Kim’s husband.
It is with immense sadness that I am posting what will be the last post on Kimberly’s account before I memorialize it.
Thank you to the many friends who have reached out to support Kimberly in her fight the last few months.

https://www.turrentinejacksonmorrow.com/obituaries/kimberly-kim-knesek-dewailly
post_text:
Hello all,
This is Luc, Kim’s husband.
It is with immense sadness that I am posting what will be the last post on Kimberly’s account before I memorialize it.
Thank you to the many friends who have reached out to support Kimberly in her fight the last few months.

https://www.turrentinejacksonmorrow.com/obituaries/kimberly-kim-knesek-dewailly

comments_full.comment_text: Luc so sad to hear of this, thinking of you and your family and keeping you all in my prayers
Oh Luc! I’m devastated to hear this! Prayers for your family! The world lost an angel for sure!

Praying God's blessing on you all during this challenging time. I loved my time with Kim in high school theater. She will be missed. I kook forward to celebrating with her, cancer free (for us both), someday in Heaven with our amazing Father!
Kim and I went to middle school together! She was such a sweet and kind soul! I am so sad to hear of her passing! My deepest condolences to her family! 😢

She was an incredible kind and caring person. I only have wonderful memories of her in high school and growing up. She babysat my younger siblings. Although it’s been years since we’ve connected except on Facebook, she has always had a special place in my heart. My deepest sympathies to her family.
Dang, terrible news. Sad to lose such a great classmate, engineer, and overall person.
I'm deeply sorry and send my condolences to you and the family. Kim's memory will continue to be a light to all who knew her!
I’m so shocked and saddened by this. My prayers and condolences are with you and your family.
It is a sad day. Prayers to you and your family.
So sorry for your loss 🥲Prayers for peace and comfort in your time of grief. In Jesus mighty name. Amen 🙏🏼
I’m so sad to hear about Kim. Prayers to you and your family.

I am very sad to hear this news. I did not realize she was battling cancer. I’m so glad we connected over the last few years. I work always have fond memories of Kim and her family growing up in Providence

Very saddened to hear about your loss and I will pray for Kim and your family. Kim and I didn’t stay in touch beyond Facebook in the years since we left Aggieland, but I still have fond memories of her smile and kindness during our time at school together.

I am so shocked and saddened for hear this news!! Kim Dewdrop was so sweet, I remember her from a very young age since middle school. Her smile brightened up the room and was always so warm and friendly. My prayers to the family to get through these trying times. 🙏😔
Oh my, Luc - my deepest condolences, to your family!🙏🏿😢
This news breaks my heart. Kim was always such a light at school growing up, so fun and kind and a wonderful friend. She will be very missed. Prayers going up to her now and for you and her family.
I’m sad to hear this news and very sorry for your loss. Hoping for peace and thinking of you and your sons and families grieving. I will always remember Kim’s kindness.
I'm so sorry for your loss. Sending love and prayers to you and your boys and all of your family.
may get memory be a blessing. we hadn't spoken in years, but she was a joy to know in high school
Incredibly sad to hear this. Sending prayers to your family during this unthinkable time. Kim will be dearly missed by so many in our industry. She made a very positive impact through her work.

Oh, I am so sad to hear this. Our sons were at Playday together and I have fun memories of birthday parties and soccer games. We shared our love of theatre. ❤️ What a beautiful, colorful, funny soul she is! Heaven just gained a Golden One!
Love and prayers for all. Such a sweetheart.😢
So heartbreaking. I am praying for your family.
I remember Kim as joyful, kind, enthusiastic, and excited...a loving friend. Hugs to all who knew her even better than I. What a loss 💔
Very saddened by the news about Kim Dewdrop. She was a mighty force in the world of floodplain management. Her smile and positivity will be greatly missed by many. Prayers for her family.

Luv, I am so sorry.
Sending prayers for God’s comfort and peace for you and the boys.
My condolences, Luc :(
I am so sorry for your loss. Kim is such a kind soul.

I always remember how smart she was. Once while flying over Galveston I took a pic and asked why clouds only gather over land. She had an immediate, scientific answer. It’s been our privilege to pray for Kimberly and family. See you Monday. 💙

I checked my email this morning and got two messages from Facebook with a code because I apparently asked to change my password—I didn’t. I’m never on Facebook anymore.

But I wanted to investigate so I opened Facebook to do what I needed to do and since I was still in bed, when I shifted around, my thumb scrolled the page and landed on a post that made my heart sink so deep.

It was this post.

She was JUST on my mind the other day. I was thinking about how she’s an engineer and how great that is and about some of the stories she’s posted—like the one where she wanted to learn French, but her mom wanted her to take Spanish classes and then she ended up marrying into a French family (such a cute story)—and how she’s one of the people I miss the most about not being active on Facebook anymore.

We used to send each other messages of comfort during Trump's presidency because everything felt so upside down to us, “we’ll get through this” and “there's hope because of XYZ” and "thank you for saying what you did—I feel less alone" She was one of the friends who would often say “I wish we were neighbors!” And I truly wish we were! It would have been so fun.

I knew Kim from elementary school. Maybe since first grade? We never had any classes together—she was always in the advanced classes, but maybe we had a few art and music classes together—and we weren’t super close, but we were friends enough to keep in touch as soon as the technology allowed us to be. Of all the faces of the kids we went to elementary school with, hers is always so clear to me, like if I was asked to think of all the kids that went to Mission Glen with me, hers would be among them—Kim with the brown hair and the big smile and that dimple so deep.

I just cannot believe she’s gone. My heart goes out to her, her husband and two boys, and her family. I hope they find comfort in this great big loss.

My deepest condolences to you and your family. I lived a few houses down from Kim when we were kids and she was good friends with my younger sister. I'll never forget how sweet Kim was and how she would bring by homemade cookies to my house during Christmastime. She grew up to be such an amazing wife and mom and I saw all her love for her family in her Facebook posts. May she rest in peace.

I am very saddened by this news. I grew up down the street from Kim and she was one of my closest friends in elementary school. We were constantly at each other’s houses and rode the bus together daily for years. She was such a kind and joyful person. Praying for your family during this difficult time.

So sad to see this! I have many memories of time spent with Kim and Michelle in the neighborhood and with theatre. She always always happy (with a smile that lit up the room!), and so kind to everyone.

I enjoyed keeping up with her on Facebook, and it was obvious just how much she loved her family. Praying for you all.
Luc - I’m so sorry to see this news. Kim’s kindness and infectious smile will always be remembered. You and the boys will be in my prayers - 🤍 Jessica Harrison Harris
Praying for your family! I’m so sorry.
I am very sorry for your loss. I will always remember her beautiful smile. Prayers for you and your family.￼

Sweet Kim... I had no idea.
I am so sorry to hear of this loss. I knew Kim from theater and then Facebook chats of motherhood, scouting and the joys of sons.
Prayers of peace and comfort for her family as I know this sweet sould will be desperately missed. 💙
I’m so so sorry for your loss. I only have the best memories of Kim and her smile and kindness. Thinking of y’all.
Praying for you all! Kim will be greatly missed.
Oh, I am so sorry. Heaven gained a beautiful smile, proud mama and a kind and helpful person. She will be missed for sure. Hugs!
Kim has been a genuine treasure, in many ways, to many people, for sure. This loss is heartbreaking.

Luc, I’m so sorry to hear this. Kim was such a good friend to me and to so many people, she was just a bright light wherever she was. She was a wonderful engineer who cared about the people she worked for, but more than anything she loved you and the boys.
May God rest her kind soul 🙏🏽
Oh. How terrible. I am so sorry to hear this. Praying you find peace and strength in her memory.
Luc I am so very sorry for your loss. You and your dear family are in my thoughts and prayers.
Luc, I am so sorry to see this. Kim was a wonderful person. Please let me know if I can help with anything.
Sending my condolences to you and your family. I am very sorry to hear of Kim’s passing. She was a beautiful person, sweet, so caring, and always smiling.

I’m very shocked and sad to hear about this. I went to high school with Kim. She was extremely talented and took all honor classes. We were in the SWAT (Students with Testimonies) club. We encourage others to strengthen their faith through Bible study.
Praying for you and your boys.
I’m so saddened by this news. Prayers for your family during this difficult time!
Luc, I am so sorry. I went to college with Kim at Texas A&M. We had many classes together. I remember her as so smart and kind. She always lit up the room with her presence and smile. 💔

I had the honor of being Marc’s 5th grade teacher and I loved getting to know Kim. We bonded over Czech heritage and Kim would frequently check in on me…just making sure I was doing okay while teaching during covid. Her life made a mark on others ❤️

We are so very heartbroken about the passing of your sweet and beloved Kim. Please know our family continues to pray for you and the boys.
May her beautiful memory live on forever in our hearts. Please know that we and all of Wellspring are here to support and help you in anyway possible. 🙏
I am so sad to hear this. 💔 Condolences to you and your family.

I am so sorry for all our loss because Kim was a very special person. I always look forward to seeing her letters around Christmas and pictures of y’all’s trips that y’all took, and she will truly be missed. God bless.
She will be dearly missed. Please let me know if I can do anything for you.
My heart just stopped as I saw this. Always such a positive person her light always brought much joy to everyone around her. So sorry for such a great loss. Prayers for your family.

I am heartbroken hearing this news. I worked with Kim at Halff and she was always so quick with a smile and brought lots of joy to the office. I really missed working with her. I am sending love and prayers for your family ♥️
Hugs and prayers to you all. Kim was absolutely amazing and such a joy to be around. She always had a beautiful smile on her face ❤️
We were so wrapped up in Bill’s cancer journey that I never heard anything. I’m heartbroken for Luc and the boys. (and everyone whose life she touched.)
Omg.. so shocked.. may she rest in peace next to our Lord and Savior. Will keep your family in my prayers.. she was such a bright light.
Oh my goodness, I'm heartbroken. I will never forget her radiant smile. I'm so sorry for you and the boys.
My family and I are very sad to hear of her passing. Our prayers are with you and your family. ❤️🙏
So sorry Luc. Whatever you guys need

Oh Luc, I had no idea any of this was happening and I am so completely heartbroken for you and the boys. Kim was such a wonderful person, the brightest light full of positivity. She was one of my favorite parents to see at pick up and I loved that we continued to stay in touch all these years later. Sending so much love your way as you navigate everything right now, especially supporting your boys. She was a very special person ❤️
So very sorry. All of you are being held close in prayer.
Luc, Kari and are so devastated to hear this. Thinking of you and the boys.
Kim was wonderful and I am sorry for loss. Our prayers are with you.

I’m so sorry… sending prayers and hope for your peace of mind during this awful time. I will always remember Kim as a spirited, joyful, hilarious high schooler who greatly brightened my years at Kempner. I’ve loved the Christmas cards in recent years with photos of your great adventures and your beautiful family. Kim packed a lot of life into every day of her 42 short years. I won’t ever forget her laugh. ❤️
I’m so saddened to hear this. I grew up across the street from her. She and Michelle were my daily after school friends throughout elementary and middle school. I am so sorry for your loss.

I'm sorry to hear. Prayers to you Luc, the boys and the rest of the family. I miss talking with Kim about floodplain related issues in Dallas and Plano. Really enjoyed working with her at Halff. She will be deeply missed.

Luc,

I am so sorry. I know there is a hole left, but I also know she is no longer in pain. Love to you and the boys...if you need ANYTHING do not hesitate to ask!

As a fellow floodie, I felt her passion for protecting people and property from flood as a beautiful, smart, contagious energy. She was always willing to help professionally,
and just a dang good person. Sending lots of love to her whole family.

Mes sincères condoléances Luc, Marc, Mathieu, les parents à Kim et les vôtres, je vous souhaite beaucoup de courage pour avancé dans la vie avec une perte si importante pour vous et les garçons. Je continue avec mes prières pour que son âme repose en paix et pour que Dieu vos protège et vous donne de la force. Je vous embrasse affectueusement
toute la famille
Oh no, sending all of my Aggie love to her family and friends and prayers for all. Gig'em forever, Kim.
Prayers with the family
Had no idea. Gone way too soon. Prayers for you and your boys Luc.

I had no idea... I'm absolutely gutted. I'm so very very sorry for your loss. I cared very much for her and have fond memories of our time in high school.

She was awesome.

I am so sorry. Sending you and your family my condolences. She lived a block from me when we were in high school. We rode the same bus home. I just remember she was always sweet and kind to everyone. Utterly heart broken for you and your family.
Prayers for you and the boys as you go thru this tough time.
Oh my goodness. I had no idea. I’m so sad. 😞 I’ve known Kim since kindergarten. She was one of the most kind hearted people I’ve ever known.
So very sorry for your loss. Prayers for comfort and love to surround you.
I am sorry for you and your family’s loss. She was a wonderful soul and one of the sweetest people I have met in my life. She will be missed.

Luc, I am so sad to hear the news of Kim’s passing. I’ve been keeping up with her battle through Brian and Karen. I just want you to know that we are thinking of her and you and the boys. Time will help the wounds left behind but we’ll never forget Kim and her magical personality. She will be missed!!
Love, Jim and Grace.
I didn’t know Kim well. But, she was always kind and sweet to everyone. My heart is aching for you and your sweet boys! You are all in my prayers!
So sorry for your loss. Keeping your family in our thoughts and prayers 🙏
I am praying for you as you navigate through this. Kim was such an amazing person. She was so kind and positive. Praying for all of you ❤️
Kim was such a light to this world. I am so sorry for your loss. We are lifting you all up in prayer.

Kim, this wasn’t the way it was supposed to end. You were an unexpected friend when I needed it the most. I will never look at Isacc’s Arrow of Light award and not think of you. My life as a scout mom won’t be the same without you.

Luc and boys, our love and prayers are with you.

Dear Luc, l am shocked and broken heart, to hear this unexpected tragic news ! I am very, very sorry !!!
Praying for you and your family, in this most difficult time.

We will miss Kim so much and she is forever in our hearts. I am so grateful for the time I have known Kim and have wonderful memories of fun times together. We love your family dearly and are here for you always. Prayers continue daily for you all.

Luc, I am so sad for your loss and want you to know we are praying for you and the boys and y’all’s entire family. I still remember the first time she and I ran into each other at the Methodist church after not seeing each other since graduating from Texas A&M. I love that we got to reconnect, that we got to spend time with you both on Sunday School and church. She had such an amazing heart and impacted so many lives. Please let us know if there is anything you all need even if it is just a ride somewhere for the boys. Praying for you friend.
I’m heart broken to hear of this. Sending my sincerest condolences. 🙏
Praying for your sweet family. I’m so sorry for your loss.
I’m so sorry for your loss. Prayers for you and the boys.

I am so so very sorry to hear this. Kim and I were best friends in middle school. I had just moved from a completely different part of Houston and knew not one person. Kim came along when I most needed a friend. She is embedded in almost all of my middle school memories. Praying for you, the sweet boys, and her family. 💕
I’m so sad to see this. Prayers for you and the family.
I am heartbroken to read this!! She was such an amazing person. She had the most beautiful contagious smile! Prayers for you & the boys!! 🙏

I am heartbroken to hear of her passing. Kim was just the sweetest person. I was so glad when we reconnected through fb and loved when she would share with me how your son was doing in band. I am so sorry. You all have my deepest condolences and will keep your family in my prayers.
I am so sorry for your loss 💔
I am so sorry, prayers for her family and those who were close. She was always so kind and had the best smile.
Praying for strength and peace for your family as you navigate this new journey. May she rest in peace.
Just shocking. Luc, my whole family hurts with you.

My deepest condolences to you and your family! I knew Kim through Project Sunshine where she served as an amazing volunteer. May you and your family be embraced and filled with peace in knowing His promise. You all will.be.in mÿ thoughts and prayers.

I'm so heartbroken to hear💔of Kim's passing. She was an amazing and a wonderful mother to Marc & Mathieu. You could see the love she had for you Luc. Kim had such a contagious laugh, always made me smile to hear it. Praying for all of you. May Ronnie, Phyllis, Michelle, and you all find peace in this difficult time. Deepest sympathy & ❤️‍🩹 condolences 💐.
I am so sorry. Kim was a remarkable person! ￼Hugs and prayers to you and the boys. Please let me know if y’all need anything. 🙏🏻💔 ￼

I’m genuinely very heartbroken to hear this…….

Luc, you and I never met personally but I went to elementary school with Kim and she grew up down the street from my wife, who is also childhood friends with Kim.

Our families exchange Christmas cards every year and we even tried to link up with y’all in Paris one Christmas!

You all will be in our hearts, thoughts, and prayers…..
My deepest condolences on your loss. I will never forget how welcoming she was to me when I moved back to Texas even though I worked for the other city. She will be missed greatly by so many. 😥
Oh Luc, I’m so sorry for your loss. Prayers for you and the family.🙏
I’m so sorry for your lost. She’s with the lord now watching over her family.
Sending you and the family prayers. I am so sorry.
I’m sad to hear this. We were friends freshman year and she always made me laugh. Hugs and prayers for her family.

Prayers for you and your family. I’m sure there are so many decisions to make right now, but if this would be a comfort to your family eventually, her fellow Aggies will want to honor her: https://
www.aggienetwork
.com/muster/
rollcall/
Oh Luc, I did not know about Kim’s fight with cancer and devastated for you, the boys and your family.
I’m so sorry to hear of your loss. We grew up in church and school together. Praying for your beautiful family. She always seemed to show so much joy to those who encountered her.
I am so sorry to hear this. Sending prayers and hugs to you all....
I am so so sorry…
This is just heartbreaking. Love and peace to your family.
I’m so sorry to hear this. My heart for you all. Prayers for peace and comfort.
I’m so sorry to hear this. Kim will be sorely missed… sending prayers your family’s way.
Oh my goodness! I’m so sorry!!!!!!!! My heart breaks for you all!
Luc!!! I’m so sorry to hear this. Praying for your famiky. ❤️❤️❤️

She was so genuine and kind and will be missed. I read this post right as a big storm moved in and the heavy rain started. We often chatted about storms/
flooding as she did with many so I have a feeling the timing wasn’t a coincidence. Thinking of your sweet family.
Praying for you and your boys. I’m so sorry to hear this.
Oh Luc. I’m so sorry. If you need anything just let us know.
Continuing to pray for you and your families ❤️ I’m so grateful to have known Kim through scouts.

Luc, I am so grateful for the time I got to call her a friend. Always encouraging me and being such a wonderful example of a great friend, mom, human being. I am praying for you as you navigate this terribly sad time. Love to you all.
We are so blessed to have known and been graced by Kim’s friendship all these years. We hold all of you in our hearts and are sending abundant prayers for peace, comfort, and strength. ❤️
Kim was an incredible person with a beautiful soul, and I'm sorry to hear of her passing.
Sending love to you and your boys! She was an amazing women who always had a smile that lit up the room ♥️
My deepest condolences to you and your family.
Hugs to you and the boys. She was a fighter and the best mom.

My heart is broken to hear this news. 💔 She brought life and love to this world and she definitely impacted my life. It's an honor to have known her. May God bring you comfort and peace that surpasses all understanding.
Oh my goodness. My world is shook at this news. Praying peace and understanding through this time of sadness and grief. What an amazing human this world lost. ♥️♥️♥️
Oh no!!! I didn’t know. I am so sorry to hear about Kim. She was a good friend ever since we were roommates.
I am so so sorry to hear this. Prayers of peace for your family. She was a beautiful soul.
I am so sorry to hear this. Prayers for you and your family

Praying for your family.💕Kim was such a positive radiant person who brought kindness to her community and the world is definitely a much better place because of her. I’m so sorry to hear of her passing. She was truly a gem!!
Kim was such a wonderful person. So incredibly sad to hear this. :(

Oh my gosh. Luc, we never met but I was in Project Sunshine with Kim. We hadn’t kept up much, but she reached out and was so helpful to me just earlier this year after we had a fire. It warmed my heart hugely, and was so fitting for her. I cannot believe this. Know her specialness reached far. My sincerest condolences.
This breaks my heart for you & the boys. She was an incredible person!
I'm so sorry to hear of her passing. What a wonderful human she was.
I'm so saddened to hear of Kim's passing. My prayers are with you and your boys. She was such a joy to know. Her presence will be missed by so many.

We are very sorry to hear this news. I appreciated my opportunities to work with Kim as an engineering professional and to get to connect with her as a person. It was clear she loved and cared about you all very deeply. Nos profondes condoléances à vous tous - Wylie & Boris Minot
I’m so sorry for your loss. Kim was always such a joyful person and I enjoyed getting to know her when our boys went to school together.

I am so sorry to hear about Kim's passing. I knew her through scouts and we have sons in the same classes. I always enjoyed talking with her. She will be greatly missed by many! Sending prayers for peace and comfort. ❤
I am so very sorry for your and your family’s loss. Our sincerest condolences. You’re in our thoughts and prayers. May she rest in peace.
This is heartbreaking. Kim was a classmate of mine in college and she deserved the world. She was one of the kindest souls. I’m so sorry to hear this. My sincere condolences to you and the children.

When I think of Kim, joy is what comes to mind. She was full of it! Always kind and welcoming with the best smile! We are brokenhearted, but even more so for you and the boys. We are here for anything. We love y'all.
I am so incredibly sad to hear this news, I had no idea she was sick and my deepest condolences to her family 😔￼
Oh my gosh! I am so very sorry to hear this. Keep you and your family in our prayers.
I'm so heartbroken to hear of Kim's passing. She was an amazing person and a wonderful mother to her boys. Praying for your family as you navigate the difficult days ahead.
Sending my condolences. I didn't know. Heartbreaking.

😭😭Oh Luc, Marc and Mathieu I am so so so sorry to hear this. I have been thinking about you Kim all week without knowing. Random little things. Perfume. A funny conversation Charlotte almost had in French you’d appreciate. Cats. Floods. “Our favorite rant topic” we were way overdue to rant about again. Books. And cookies. I loved our friendship and our conversations. I will miss you so much.
We will miss her so much. She had the most beautiful smile and her laugh was contagious. I know all of her grandparents welcomed her with open arms 💔 Praying for all of you
I’m so saddened to hear this. She was the sweetest person and will be greatly missed! Hugs to you and the boys.
Prayers for you and your family
I’m so sad to hear about this. Kim was such a special friend to me.
Beautifully written, Luc. It made me smile. Thank you.
Prayers and love to you and her family. 😢

Dear Dewailly Family, I am so so very sorry I did not know Kim was ill, and even more sad of this news. My heart goes out to your families, as many who know Kim will undoubtedly extend their heart, prayer and sympathies. I'd like to share with your family just so everyone knows how kind and big hearted Kim was. Having grown up with no money, having to have worn the same outfit multiple times a week, being an odd misfit on top of that, Kim has always been a friendly face to me and to so many others. She never judged or cared who I was, or where I came from, and how lucky I was to have been able to call her a friend. In theatre we all had the best laughs and the best time with the productions we put on, her enthusiasm and can do attitude during all those years in school, are memories I will always carry with me. Please accept my condolences and thoughts of peace and healing. Kim was truly one of the greatest...
I am so sorry to hear this. She was a joy to see every morning and her love for the boys was beautiful. Praying for you guys
She was a sweet spirit. Always so kind. I am so saddened to hear of her passing. Praying for you and your family.
So sorry for your loss. Prayers for your family. 🙏🏻🙏🏻
Oh my what terrible news!! I was a coworker of Kim’s at HDR. She was smart, sweet, and loved what she did. I’m so very sorry to hear about her passing. Will be praying for you and the boys 💙
This is such sad news. I'm so sorry. Sending prayers.
So very sorry for your loss. She was very kind and always had a smile on her face.
So sad to hear this news. My condolences go out to you and your family
I am so sorry for your loss. Prayers for your family 🙏
My heart is broken!! I am so sad to hear this news. Kim was just a joy to grow up with, always smiling! She will be missed by everyone. Many prayers for you, the boys and the entire family❤️
My heart is broken 💔
Blessings and prayers from the Scherpereel family. Dear neighbors for so many years in Providence. Kim always had a smile on her face - may she rest in eternal peace with the Lord.
Prayers for you and your boys. She was a truly special person.
Sending you and your family our condolences and our love. I went to high school with Kim and have the best memories of her. She was a sweet and caring friend and loved keeping up with her on here.
I’m so sorry Luc. God bless you and your family!!
Such a huge loss. My heart goes out to your family. I’ll be praying comfort and peace for each of you.
May her memory be a blessing. I got to know Kim when she and Jennifer were roommates and she was always such a delight. Our hearts go out to you and the boys.
I am so sorry, I didn’t know Kim long. But she was such a sweet spirit, always kind and helpful. Your family is in our prayers.

Luc ,
Adam and I are so sorry for you and your families loss. We are so grateful that we have been able to know her and your family. She was an amazing woman and one of a kind. We will miss her so much and cherish the time we have had with her. We will continue to pray for your family. If there is anything we can do for you . We will be there without a shadow of a doubt.
2148569575.
So sad to hear this. So sorry for your loss. She will be missed, we always enjoyed her letters at Christmas. Prayers for you and the boys in the coming days.
My prayers for your family during this very difficult time.
I am shocked and saddened to hear this news. Sending prayers for comfort and peace to you, your boys, your parents & Michelle Knesek Cortez 🙏💔
Many prayers for your family. An immeasurable loss.

Luc and family- I am so saddened to hear this news. She was the sweetest!My son played soccer with yours years ago… please let me know if there is anything that could bring some joy to the boys and your family.
I’m so, so sad to see this update. I had been praying for her. I will continue to pray for y’all. I know how much she loved all of you.
I'm so, so very sorry to hear of Kim's passing. Lots of love and prayers to all of you.
I’m broken hearted and will miss her so much. We are always here for you and the boys.
I’m very shocked and sad to hear about Kim. I’m praying for you and your family in this most difficult time.
Her work family is heartbroken. She will be so missed. Our hearts go out to you Luc and the boys.
Prayers for you and your family. 🤍🤍
